function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing at construction sites","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict social distancing measures and providing appropriate protective equipment","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, AI surveillance systems","People":"Construction workers, site supervisors, visitors","Owner":"Construction company management, site supervisors"},{"Description":"Supply chain challenges and workforce shortages","Impact":"Delays in construction projects and potential bankruptcy for construction firms","Mitigation":"Diversifying supply chains, remote work, and flexible scheduling","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, remote collaboration tools","People":"Construction employees, contractors, subcontractors","Owner":"Construction company management, project managers"},{"Description":"Halted construction activities","Impact":"Financial losses, potential bankruptcies, and delayed projects","Mitigation":"Remote work planning, financial assistance programs, and diversifying business operations","Technologies":"Remote project management tools, financial forecasting software","People":"Contractors, subcontractors, construction employees","Owner":"Construction company management, project managers"}]}
